DEBUG.title: Debug Mode
DEBUG.description: Enables debug mode. See documentation for behavior changes.

title.title: Title
title.description: The main title over the window. Supports substitutions.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: The icon shown at the top center of the window. There are many options to define icons, as described in the documentation.

message.title: Message
message.default: Setup Manager is configuring your Macâ€¦
message.description: The message shown below the title. Supports Markdown and substitutions.

background.title: Background Image
background.description: When set, Setup Manager displays the image full screen as a background behind the main window. Supports the same sources as Icon.

runAt.title: Run At
runAt.description: This value determines when Setup Manager should launch.

accentColor.title: Accent Color
accentColor.description: Sets the accent color for buttons, progress bar, SF Symbol icons, and other UI elements. Use this to match branding. Color is encoded as a six digit hex code, e.g. #FF0088.

finalCountdown.title: Final Countdown
finalCountdown.description: Changes the duration (in seconds) of the "final countdown" before the app automatically performs the finalAction. Set to -1 (or any negative number) to disable automated execution. This setting is ignored if finalAction is set to 'none'.

finalAction.title: Final Action
finalAction.description: Sets the action and label for the button shown when Setup Manger has completed.

totalDownloadBytes.title: Total Download Bytes
totalDownloadBytes.description: Use this value to provide an estimate for the total size of all items that will be downloaded.

jssID.title: Jamf Pro ID
jssID.description: When using JSM with Jamf Pro, set this to $JSSID in a Jamf Pro configuration profile and Setup Manager will be aware of its computer's id in Jamf Pro.

userID.title: Jamf Pro User ID
userID.description: Set this to $EMAIL in the configuration profile. This communicates the user who logged in to customized enrollment to Setup Manager. This can be used together with the userEntry.showForUserIDs key to control which users see the user entry UI.

computerNameTemplate.title: Computer Name Template
computerNameTemplate.description: Setup Manager will generate the computer name from this template and set it automatically. See the documentation for substitutions that can used in the template. (Setting this overrides the Computer Name field in user entry.)

overrideSerialNumber.title: Demonstration Serial Number
overrideSerialNumber.description: When set, the "About this Mac" info window will show this value instead of the real serial number.

hideActionLabels.title: Hide Action Labels
hideActionLabels.description: Hides the individual labels under each action's icon.

actionOutputLogging.title: Action Output Logging
actionOutputLogging.description: Controls whether the output of actions is written to the Setup Manager log file.

hideDebugLabel.title: Hide Debug Label
hideDebugLabel.description: Suppresses display of the red 'DEBUG' label in debug mode.

simulateMDM.title: Simulate an MDM
simulateMDM.description: When debug mode is enabled, you can set this to Jamf Pro or Jamf School. This allows you to do test runs on un-enrolled Macs.

help.title: Help
help.description: When you provide help, a help button (with a circled question mark) will be shown in the lower right corner (for left-to-right localizations). When you click on the help button a window with information will be shown.

title.title: Help Title
title.description: The title for the help message.

url.title: Help URL
url.description: The URL will be translated into a QR code and displayed next to the help message.

userEntry.title: User Entry
userEntry.description: When any of these are defined, Setup Manager will prompt for user data while the enrollment actions are running.

default.title: User ID Default
default.description: A pre-populated value for the User ID field.

placeholder.title: User ID Placeholder
placeholder.description: A placeholder value for User ID. This is displayed in gray when no value has been entered.

options.title: User ID Options
options.description: Options displayed in a dropdown menu for User ID.

validation.title: User ID Validation
validation.description: A regular expression used to validate the value of User ID.

validationMessage.title: User ID Validation Message
validationMessage.description: A message displayed to the user when User ID fails to match the regular expression.

label.title: User ID Label
label.description: Override the default label for the User ID field.

placeholder.title: Email Placeholder
placeholder.description: A placeholder value for Email. This is displayed in gray when no value has been entered.

computerName.title: Computer Name
computerName.description: If computerNameTemplate is set, any data entry for computer name is ignored.

default.title: Computer Name Default
default.description: A pre-populated value for the Computer Name field.

placeholder.title: Computer Name Placeholder
placeholder.description: A placeholder value for Computer Name. This is displayed in gray when no value has been entered.

options.title: Computer Name Options
options.description: Options displayed in a dropdown menu for Computer Name.

validation.title: Computer Name Validation
validation.description: A regular expression used to validate the value of Computer Name.

validationMessage.title: Computer Name Validation Message
validationMessage.description: A message displayed to the user when Computer Name fails to match the regular expression.

label.title: Computer Name Label
label.description: Override the default label for the Computer Name field.

showForUserIDs.title: Show User Entry for User IDs
showForUserIDs.description: You can configure Setup Manager to only show the user entry section when specified users have authenticated in enrollment customization.

label.title: Label
label.description: The label is used as the name of the action in display.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: The icon shown for the action.

shell.title: Shell: command
shell.description: The absolute path to the command or script that should be run for this action.

policy.title: Jamf Pro Policy Trigger
policy.description: The absolute path to the command or script that should be run for this action.

watchPath.title: Watch Path
watchPath.description: This action will wait until a file at the given path exists or is removed.

timeout.title: Watch Path: Timeout
timeout.description: The watchPath action will fail after this timeout.

waitForUserEntry.title: Wait For User Entry
waitForUserEntry.description: If Setup Manager reaches this action before the user entry has been completed, it will wait until the user entry is completed and the user has clicked 'Save.'

recon.title: Jamf Pro Recon
recon.description: This will run a Jamf Inventory update.

installomator.title: Installomator Label
installomator.description: The installomator label to run. Can also use Arguments.

enrollmentActions.title: Enrollment Actions
enrollmentActions.description: Describes the individual actions to be performed by Setup Manager. For each row, complete the Label, Icon, and then one of the following: Shell command, Jamf Pro Policy Trigger, Watch Path, Wait, Wait For User Entry, Jamf Pro Recon, or Installomator Label.

finishedScript.title: Finished Script
finishedScript.description: A full path to a script file which will be executed after Setup Manager has finished its workflow. This process runs independently of Setup Manager, so it can run installers or scripts that affect Setup Manager.

finishedTrigger.title: Finished Jamf Pro Policy Trigger
finishedTrigger.description: A custom Jamf Pro policy trigger which will be executed after Setup Manager has finished its workflow. This process runs independently of Setup Manager, so it can run installers or scripts that affect Setup Manager.

started.title: Started Webhooks
started.description: Webhooks called when Setup Manager starts its workflow.

finished.title: Finished Webhooks
finished.description: Webhooks called when Setup Manager finishes its workflow.

host.title: Host
host.description: The host name, e.g. host.example.com (no url scheme) to test a connection to.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port to test a connection to.

label.title: Label
label.description: A display label for the connection test.

networkCheck.title: Network Checks
networkCheck.description: Provides a list of hosts to check connectivity to. These will be shown in the 'Connectivity' section in the network info pane. Be sure to read the documentation before configuring.

PLEASE_DO_NOT_TRACK.title: Do Not Track
PLEASE_DO_NOT_TRACK.description: Suppress launch tracking by enabling this setting.
